    #include<iostream>
     
    using namespace std;
     
    int main()
    {
    	int t,n;
    	
    	cin >> t;
    	
    	while(t--)
    	{
    		cin >> n;
    		
    		for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
    		{
    			if(n%2 == 0)
    			{
    				cout << "ALICE" << endl;
    				
    				
    			}
    			else
    			cout << "BOB" << endl;
    			
    			
    			
    			break;
    			
    			
    		}
    	}
    	return 0;
    	
    }
